message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. Can we meet in the middle at $17500?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $20000 might be a stretch for you, but I'm still confident that this product is worth a premium price. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair value. I'm willing to lower the price to $19000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but $19000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to go up to $16000, but that's as high as I can go. Can we meet in the middle at $17500?

I understand that you're willing to go up to $16500, Bob, but I'm still not convinced that's a fair price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a decent profit. I'm willing to lower the price to $18500. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm starting to feel like we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to go up to $16500, but that's as high as I can go. Can we meet at $16500?
